0.name: Apple___Apple_scab
0.cause: Fungus Venturia inaequalis. Favorable conditions are cool, wet weather.
0.cure: Use fungicides and resistant apple varieties. Prune and destroy infected leaves.

1.name: Apple___Black_rot
1.cause: Caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.
1.cure: Prune and remove infected areas. Apply fungicides during the growing season.

2.name: Apple___Cedar_apple_rust
2.cause: Fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae. Requires junipers as an alternate host.
2.cure: Remove nearby juniper hosts. Use resistant varieties and fungicides.

3.name: Apple___healthy
3.cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.
